events: Lost their sibling Heile when Ghodekin was 11 and Heile was 16.
Lost their sibling Elyasа when Ghodekin was 17 and Elyasа was 13.
Lost their sibling Sophia when Ghodekin was 18 and Sophia was 21.
Lost their sibling Lubertus when Ghodekin was 20 and Lubertus was 18.
Lost wife Aghete when she gave birth to Nimme.
Lost their sibling Rolant when Ghodekin was 21 and Rolant was 16.
Lost their sibling Berta when Ghodekin was 22 and Berta was 3.
Lost father at the age of 22
Lost their sibling Reuro when Ghodekin was 25 and Reuro was 27.
Lost their sibling Winardusа when Ghodekin was 27 and Winardusа was 24.
Lost their child Atghardis when Atghardis was 10 years old.
Lost mother at the age of 28
